metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7846 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: tag/tag_autocomplete.php in Moodle through 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.9,2.6.x before 2.6.6, and 2.7.x before 2.7.3 does not consider themoodle/tag:edit capability before adding a tag, which allows remoteauthenticated users to bypass intended access restrictions via an AJAXrequest.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
